sentences.en: Even if your personal reinvention is less drastic, we think there are lessons from her experience that apply.
sentences.cn: 即使你的个人重塑计划没有那么夸张，我们认为，从她的经验中可以学到一些有用的东西。

sentences.en: The rise of the mobile phone has recently added a new level of complexity to the process of retail reinvention.
sentences.cn: 最近，手机的兴起使零售业的再创造过程变得更加复杂。

sentences.en: Retail reinvention is not a simple process, and it's also not happening on what used to be called "Internet Time".
sentences.cn: 零售的再创造并不是一种简单的过程，它也不是在过去被称为的“互联网时代”发生。
